title: Cat's Pride Premium Lightweight Clumping Litter: Pure & Fresh - Up to 10 Days of Powerful Odor Control - Multi-Cat, Scented, 10 Pounds
description: Cat's Pride has been thinking outside the litter box for more than 80 years. We are committed to doing whatever it takes to improve our products and the lives of cats and their people. That’s why we created Litter for Good, a program that helps shelter cats find their forever homes by donating one pound of litter for every jug sold.
